closed_reason: Ported version and upgrade commands to Cobra. Updated version.go with update checking logic (CheckForUpdate, DetectInstallMethod, UpdateInstructions). Created upgrade.go with self-update functionality. Added both commands to Cobra routing in main.go switch statement. --version/-v flags still use legacy runVersion.
description: Migrate version (show version info) and upgrade (self-update) commands to Cobra.
title: Port version and upgrade commands to Cobra
